title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint and canceling the operation, the breakpoint is not successfully canceled.
OB: After clicking cancel in the progress dialog, the exception breakpoint remains added and active in the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective.
EB: After clicking cancel in the progress dialog, the exception breakpoint should not be added and should not appear in the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective.
SR:
1) Open the debug perspective
2) Go to the breakpoints pane
3) Click the 'J!' button to add an exception breakpoint
4) In the progress dialog, click cancel
5) Verify that the exception breakpoint is not added and does not appear in the breakpoints pane
